Detailed Description

A two-dimensional image that can be used as a textur, backgoround or sprite image.

int  y,

void write_ppm ( const char *  name  )  const

Write image as ppm file(alpha component is ignored), for only debug .

注意：OpenGLは左下が(0,0)、ppmは左上が(0,0)

Member Data Documentation

const int ALPHA = 96 [static]

A constructor parameter specifying that this Image2D has an alpha component only.

const int LUMINANCE = 97 [static]

A constructor parameter specifying that this Image2D has a luminance component only.

const int LUMINANCE_ALPHA = 98 [static]

A constructor parameter specifying that this Image2D has luminance and an alpha component only.

const int RGB = 99 [static]

A constructor parameter specifying that this Image2D has red, green and blue color components.

const int RGBA = 100 [static]

A constructor parameter specifying that this Image2D has red, green, blue and alpha color components.
